subject: Pedal axis values keep jumping
description_text: Can’t calibrate Pedals in iRacing because the input values keep jumping all over the place and registering a value with zero input

conversations.body_text: Hi Chance Lyon,    If it is a ProX Ultra pedal,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.
